explanation: [0-0] On a beach soccer field, two players in white T-shirts stand side by side in the same pose, the barefoot player with his left foot on the ground and his right foot raised to the right of the frame. The player in green sneakers has his right foot on the ground and his left foot raised to the left of the frame, the sole of his left foot resting on the right shoe of the other player. In the upper left corner of the screen is the yellow base with white "Beachy" subtitles, and on the right side of the screen is the white base with black "Classic" subtitles.

[0-2] The camera zoomed out, the barefoot player held a yellow ball in his left hand, the player in green sneakers put his right hand on the shoulder of the barefoot player, they both lowered their heads, pointed their fingers at their feet, and then looked at the camera.

[0-2] The camera zoomed out, the barefoot player held a yellow ball in his left hand, the player in green sneakers put his right hand on the shoulder of the barefoot player, they both lowered their heads, pointed their fingers at their feet, and then looked at the camera.

[2-7] Back to the player in the green sneakers, he put the ball on the sand, ready to shoot, kicked and shot, but the ball went wide, and he slipped on the sand. At this time, a red cross appeared below the white background and black "Classic" subtitles on the right side of the screen.

[2-7] Back to the player in the green sneakers, he put the ball on the sand, ready to shoot, kicked and shot, but the ball went wide, and he slipped on the sand. At this time, a red cross appeared below the white background and black "Classic" subtitles on the right side of the screen.

[7-12] Back to the barefoot player, he drew a circle on the beach with the ball, then put the ball on the ground, ready to show the "beach style", and then he kicked the ball into the goal with one foot. At this time, there is a green bottom white check mark below the yellow bottom white "Beachy" subtitles in the upper left corner of the screen.

[12-20] Back to the player in the green sneakers, who is kicking the ball and accidentally falls when he is about to kick the red plastic obstacle in front of him. The camera goes back to the barefoot player, who spreads his hands, faces the camera, and makes a helpless expression. At this time, two red crosses appear below the white background and black "Classic" subtitles on the right side of the screen. Then he pointed his finger and shook his head, then lowered his head and pointed at the ball at his feet. Then he ran and kicked the ball, successfully dodged when he encountered the red plastic obstacle in front of him, and shot the ball into the goal with one kick. At this time, there are two green bottom white check marks below the yellow bottom white "Beachy" subtitles in the upper left corner of the screen.
